live_updates: Services have been stabilized and the issue is now resolved. We thank you for your patience during the interruption.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
65434.summary: Some customers in the Quesnell Heights area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
65434.title: Aug 13 - Edmonton (Quesnell Heights) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
